items.sentence: Why don't you tell us what made you think that that was going to happen?
I'm sure I'll get along with him because we're from the same prefecture.
You didn't know you were the ones who were supposed to do that, did you?
You didn't know you were supposed to do that before I got here, did you?
You did know that I was the one who was supposed to do that, didn't you?
I was going to go swimming today, but I left my swimming things at home.
I can't remember the last time I've seen you so excited about something.
Tom was about to shoot himself, but Mary was able to talk him out of it.
Tom went to the police station to report that his truck had been stolen.
I heard something about that, but I don't know if what I heard was true.
